title: Himi 238
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Sihova ‘o e Sāpate,
Ke ke ‘Afio ‘ofa mai;
Ki he lea, ‘a ho kakai,
‘I ho fale, he ‘aho ni.
2.
Pea mo e ngaahi hiva,
Mo e lotu ‘oku mau fai;
Hangē ko ho finangalo,
Ke ke talia ‘ofa mai.
3.
‘Oku lahi ‘emau ‘ofa
Ki ho Sāpate ‘i lalo;
‘Oku taau mo kimautolu,
Ke mau kumi ‘a e poto.
4.
Ka ko e Sāpate lahi,
‘Oku ‘i ‘olunga ia;
Pea mau tokanga ki ai,
Ko homau mālōlō’anga.
5.
’E ‘ikai toe mamahi,
‘E ha toko taha ‘i ai,
‘E ‘ikai huia mamahi,
Ka ‘e fiemālie pē.
6.
’Oku ‘ikai kei ha fili,
Pe ha tau, ke fakaongo;
Pe ha tokanga mamahi,
Ke maumau ‘a e mālōlō.
7.
’Oku ‘ikai ha po’uli,
Ka ‘oku ho’atā ma’u pē,
‘I he funga ‘o e lelei,
‘I he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Eiki. *
